CustomField.description: Time between created Date and first Status Change
CustomField.formula: MIN( IF(Time_Created_To_On_Hold__c =0 , 999999, Time_Created_To_On_Hold__c) , IF(Time_Created_to_Escalated__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_to_Escalated__c ) , IF(Time_Created_To_Closed__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_To_Closed__c) , IF(Time_Created_to_Preview_Sent__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_to_Preview_Sent__c) , IF(Time_Created_To_Job_Live__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_To_Job_Live__c) , IF(Time_Created_to_Discussion__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_to_Discussion__c) , IF(Time_Created_to_Go_Live_Scheduled__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_to_Go_Live_Scheduled__c) , IF(Time_Created_to_Lost__c =0, 999999, Time_Created_to_Lost__c) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Time between created Date and first Status Change
CustomField.label: First Reaction Time
